page.title: 10FASHION IN WARBLINGTON
page.content: Fashion industries today are facing increasing competition for the leisure market.Once one manufacturer thinks of something new,the others all copy. Hawaiian shirts are today's big seller with teenagers of both sexes.Expensive Designer clothes are also fashionable. These are bought for the snob value of the label{e.g.Fila,Ellesse,Lacoste, {Diadora and recently Ocean Pacific.} Most of these makes are overpriced e.g.Â£20 for a tee_shirt which without the label would normally cost Â£6. This trend extends to trainers.Once used entirely for sport,they are now part of the booming leisure wear industry.Desired brand names are{Nike, {Adidas and Hi_Tec.}The place to buy these is{Ski_Sun}in Havant.The youths who wear this fashion are called { {Dressers.}
